lrc.lyric:
[by:Frankie阿祖]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Sarvar va Komil
[00:00.697] 作词 : Sarvar va Komil
[00:02.92]Erkalay Men Seni Erkalay
[00:06.97]Sochlaringni Silab Mani Jonim
[00:11.50]Erkalay Har Kuni Erkalay
[00:15.94]Yolg'iz Erkatoyim O'zing Yorim
[00:30.32]Sochlaringni Erkalar Mayin Shamol
[00:34.79]Yuzlaringni Siypalar Tunlari Oy
[00:39.43]Yulduzlar Jilovlanib Oppoq Ko'zingda
[00:43.99]Tabasumingdan Tovlanar Ochib Chiroy
[00:48.75]Yolg'izim Hech Kim Senday Bo'la Olmas
[00:53.25]Shirin Kulishlaringa To'yib Bo'lmas
[00:57.90]Yonimda Har Doimo Sen Bo'lsang Bas
[01:02.41]Hech Narsa Kerakmas Sen Bo'lsang Bas
[01:07.14]Erkalay Men Seni Erkalay
[01:11.44]Sochlaringni Silab Mani Jonim
[01:16.04]Erkalay Har Kuni Erkalay
[01:20.57]Yolg'iz Erkatoyim O'zing Yorim
[01:43.94]Nigohlarim To'qnashsa Senga Birdan
[01:48.69]Yuragimga Sig'mayman Go'yo Shu Dam
[01:53.31]Atrofimni Sezmasdim Mahliyo Bo'lib
[01:58.00]Qaniydi Tezroq Borib Quchoqlab Olsam
[02:02.58]Erkatoyim Mani Mani Hayotim
[02:05.17]Tinglagin Senga Bitgan Dildagi Bayotim
[02:07.18]Tabassumingda Yashar Bepayon Bu Dunyo
[02:09.47]Atrofda Butun Ro'yo Bir Senga Mahliyo
[02:11.75]Yagona Keragim Yolg'izim Yuragim
[02:14.04]Doim Yonimda Bo'lsang Yagona Tilagim
[02:16.23]Bu Dunyoga Sig'mayman Bir Zumga Ko'rmasam
[02:18.54]Nafasing Sezmasam Yoningda Bo'lmasam
[02:21.27]Erkalay Men Seni Erkalay
[02:25.19]Sochlaringni Silab Mani Jonim
[02:29.81]Erkalay Har Kuni Erkalay
[02:34.37]Yolg'iz Erkatoyim O'zing Yorim
[02:39.14]Erkalay Men Seni Erkalay
[02:43.69]Sochlaringni Silab Mani Jonim
[02:48.32]Erkalay Har Kuni Erkalay
[02:52.93]Yolg'iz Erkatoyim O'zing Yorim
[02:59.72]Jonim Seni Erkalay Seni Erkalay
